content: Add push notification support by following existing source-code rules and extension patterns. Create src/workflow_engine/processors/push_processor.py with class PushProcessor, update src/workflow_engine/processors/__init__.py and src/workflow_engine/runtime/registry.py to register it, and add tests/test_push_processor.py using unittest for a successful push dispatch via build_default_runtime.

```json
{
  "summary": "Added push notification support by implementing PushProcessor, registering it in the runtime registry, and adding a unit test.",
  "project": {
    "language": "python"
  },
  "files": [
    {
      "path": "src/workflow_engine/processors/push_processor.py",
      "content": "from __future__ import annotations

from workflow_engine.contracts.processor import Processor
from workflow_engine.contracts.work_item import WorkItem
from workflow_engine.models.run_result import RunResult
from workflow_engine.processors.base_processor import BaseProcessor


class PushProcessor(BaseProcessor):
    """Processor for push notifications."""

    @property
    def name(self) -> str:
        return "push"

    def _deliver(self, item: WorkItem) -> str:
        # Simulate push delivery
        return f"push_sent_{item.identifier}"
"
    },
    {
      "path": "src/workflow_engine/processors/__init__.py",
      "content": "from workflow_engine.processors.email_processor import EmailProcessor
from workflow_engine.processors.push_processor import PushProcessor
from workflow_engine.processors.sms_processor import SmsProcessor
from workflow_engine.processors.webhook_processor import WebhookProcessor

__all__ = [
    "EmailProcessor",
    "PushProcessor",
    "SmsProcessor",
    "WebhookProcessor",
]
"
    },
    {
      "path": "src/workflow_engine/runtime/registry.py",
      "content": "from workflow_engine.processors.email_processor import EmailProcessor
from workflow_engine.processors.push_processor import PushProcessor
from workflow_engine.processors.sms_processor import SmsProcessor
from workflow_engine.processors.webhook_processor import WebhookProcessor


def register_processors(runtime):
    """Register all available processors."""
    runtime.register_processor(EmailProcessor())
    runtime.register_processor(PushProcessor())
    runtime.register_processor(SmsProcessor())
    runtime.register_processor(WebhookProcessor())
"
    },
    {
      "path": "tests/test_push_processor.py",
      "content": "import unittest

from workflow_engine.models.ticket import Ticket
from workflow_engine.runtime.bootstrap import build_default_runtime


class TestPushProcessor(unittest.TestCase):
    def test_push_dispatch(self):
        runtime = build_default_runtime()
        ticket = Ticket(
            identifier="test-push-1",
            channel="push",
            payload={"title": "Test", "body": "Hello"},
        )
        result = runtime.dispatch(ticket)
        self.assertEqual(result.status, "success")
        self.assertIn("push_sent_test-push-1", result.output)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    unittest.main()
"
    }
  ],
  "dependencies": {
    "dependencies": {},
    "devDependencies": {},
    "python": [],

    "cpp": []
  },
  "commands": [
    "python -m unittest tests.test_push_processor -v"
  ]
}
```
